Frisco.The Ford Center at The Star: The Ford Center at The Star is a 12,000-seat indoor stadium located in Frisco, Texas and is home to the Dallas Rattlers of Major League Lacrosse. It is also used for Whataburger's Friday Night Stars, an event every Friday showcasing Frisco Independent School District High School Varsity Football. It can also be used as a regulation soccer field. However, its main use is as the Dallas Cowboys' practice facility.
